title: The Inaugural Sungrow GRES 2024 Summit: Charting the Course for the Worldwide Zero-Carbon Transition
summary: Sungrow Power Supply Co., Ltd. (Sungrow) hosted the 2024 Global Renewable Energy & Storage Summit (GRES) which served as a platform to showcase Sungrow's commitment to sustainability and innovation in the renewable energy sector. Sungrow presented its latest green innovations, highlighting technological advancements such as liquid-cooled energy storage systems which address safety concerns in the industry. The company's focus on distributed solar and storage systems is part of the growing global shift towards renewable energy.
